fields.summary: iOS: Table Views - Double letters in Table View Sections after search

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a default Titanium mobile project
2. Replace the resources folder with the one attached
3. Run app and press the table view search button
4. Press inside the search field
5. Press the cancel button

Actual result:
The search button is hidden

Expected result:
The search button is still visible
fields.summary: iOS : Search bar - After pressing the cancel button on the search bar, the cancel button is hidden
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.9.0.v20120212011634
OSX Lion 10.7.3
iPhone 4S OS 5.0.1

comments.body:
Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0

Closing this ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced with the following environment; 
iPhone 7 (10.2)
MacOS 10.11.6 (15G31)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1.v20170606103146
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.1
Ti CLI 5.0.13
Alloy 1.9.11
Arrow 2.0.0
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
